4. [Ferris Municipal Court](https://www.ferristexas.gov/164/Ferris-Municipal-Court)

Our court clerks cannot provide any additional information other than what is provided on the website. If you have additional questions regarding your legal options, please contact your legal counsel. Our court clerks cannot provide legal counsel.







1. [I want to keep this off my record.](https://www.ferristexas.gov/202/I-GOT-A-TICKET#tab4041782a-0cd8-43e0-83bb-8dd0c9603458_0)

* [I want to request a payment plan.](https://www.ferristexas.gov/FormCenter/Municipal-Court-Encrypted-24/Payment-Plan-Request-134)
* [I want to make payment in full.](https://www.trafficpayment.com/SearchByInvoiceInfo.aspx?csdId=172&AspxAutoDetectCookieSupport=1)

1. [I want to enter a plea of not guilty.](https://www.ferristexas.gov/202/I-GOT-A-TICKET#tab4041782a-0cd8-43e0-83bb-8dd0c9603458_2)

* [I want to request a bench trial.](https://www.ferristexas.gov/FormCenter/Municipal-Court-Encrypted-24/Bench-Trial-Request-Form-130)
* [I want to request a jury trial.](https://www.ferristexas.gov/FormCenter/Municipal-Court-Encrypted-24/Jury-Trial-Request-Form-132)

1. [I want to know how much my ticket is.](https://www.ferristexas.gov/202/I-GOT-A-TICKET#tab4041782a-0cd8-43e0-83bb-8dd0c9603458_3)

[I want to check my ticket amount.](https://www.trafficpayment.com/SearchByInvoiceInfo.aspx?csdId=172)

1. [I am a juvenile defendant.](https://www.ferristexas.gov/202/I-GOT-A-TICKET#tab4041782a-0cd8-43e0-83bb-8dd0c9603458_4)

If you are a Juvenile Defendant (Age 16 or younger) you MUST make appearance before the Judge with a parent. You are able to meet with the Judge through VIDEO CONFERENCE via Zoom anytime after 11 A.M. Monday-Thursday.
